# Inference from Longitudinal Data

Continuous endpoints

## Categorical Time

```{r}
fit_cat_time <- mmrm::mmrm(
  formula = change ~ basval*week + trt*week + us(week | subject),
  data = all,
  control = mmrm_control(method = "Kenward-Roger")
)

```

## Continuous Time

Linear time trend

```{r}
fit_cont_time <- mmrm::mmrm(
  formula = change ~ basval*time + trt*time + us(week | subject),
  weights = all$time,
  data = all,
  control = mmrm_control(method = "Kenward-Roger")
)

```

Quadratic trend

```{r}
all$timesq <- all$time^2

fit_cont_timesq <- mmrm::mmrm(
  formula = change ~ basval*timesq + trt*timesq + us(week | subject),
  weights = all$time,
  data = all,
  control = mmrm_control(method = "Kenward-Roger")
)
```
